item.title: Create New Website With Nextjs
item.description: In this article, we’ll go through all of nextjs’s important concepts: How does nextjs work? Things you need to know to create a website with nextjs When you need to use nextjs? Real world examples: build a mcq website ( multichoice questions ) for developer with NextJS + SailsJS + MongoDB References: NextJS Multichoice questions Web Source Code NextJS Multichoice questions API Source Code Demo: https://mcq-web.
